max_cal <- menu %>% 
  select(Category,
         Item,
         Calories) %>% 
  group_by(Item) %>% 
  arrange(desc(Calories))%>% 
  head(10)%>% 
  ggplot(aes(Calories,
             y = reorder(Item,
                         Calories)
             ,fill =Item)) + 
  geom_col() +
  theme_classic()+
  theme(legend.position = \none\") +
size =3) + ggtitle(\"TOP 10 McDonald's Menu Item with the Highest Calorie Content\")
